duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the safe and effective operation of the company aircraft in the air transportation of personnel.
Conduct pre and post-flight inspections, and secure necessary supplies for the trip.
Maintain a clean passenger compartment and apprise maintenance staff of scheduled maintenance or service problems/needs.
File flight plans and attend recurrent simulator training annually.
Willingness to work irregular schedules to maintain a '24/7' on-call status.

education_certification.credential: CJ3 (C-525) Type Rating or willingness to obtain.
Valid passport with the ability to fly internationally to Canada if necessary.
Minimum of 3,000 hours of flight time, including 1,000 hours of multi-engine experience.
